dc_title_s: An invitation and a guide to the Allegan, Michigan, area's streams, lakes, forests
dc_description_s: Extent: 1 map | Notes: Title from panel.|Road map identical in appearance to 1950s-1960s maps issued by the Allegan County Road Commission.|Includes list: Your guide to major Allegan County lakes and streams.|On verso: Advertisements for local businesses, illustrations, and text: Welcome to Allegan lakes. | Scale not given
